headline: Dominion Energy (D) Stock Slides as Market Rises: Facts to Know Before You Trade

headline: Dominion Energy Announces Changes in Senior Executive Responsibilities Related To Retirement of Diane Leopold
summary: RICHMOND, Va., April 23, 2025--Dominion Energy (NYSE: D) today announced new responsibilities for three senior executives related to the retirement of Diane Leopold, executive vice president and chief operating officer, that are effective June 1, 2025.
